comment: Patient Stim Control using cards.  You may use 0 cards or up to 4 cards at one time. Patient may control either amp, rate or pulse width within each card. Stim display settings can be hidden for each card.

Card1.comment: HideCard allows you hide the card. Group format (must include double quote's): 'A', 'B', 'C' or 'D'. CustomText must be 15 characters or less in total.

StimControl.comment: StimControlType set to 0-amp, 1-rate, 2-pulse width or 3-None. HideCurrentValue hides the current value from the patient. HideCurrentValueUnits hides the units of the current value from patient. Program 0-3 to change for amp and pulse width.

Amp.comment: TargetAmp is what is set when clicking the card. AmpValues are the values that patient can move to, but only if StimControlType is set for Amp. All values in mA.

Rate.comment: TargetRate is what is set when clicking the card. RateValues are the values that patient can move to, but only if StimControlType is set for Rate. All values in Hz.

PulseWidth.comment: TargetPulseWidth is what is set when clicking the card. PulseWidthValues are the values that patient can move to, but only if StimControlType is set for PulseWidth. All values in μS.

Card2.comment: HideCard allows you hide the card. Group format (must include double quote's): 'A', 'B', 'C' or 'D'. CustomText must be 15 characters or less in total.

StimControl.comment: StimControlType set to 0-amp, 1-rate, 2-pulse width or 3-None. HideCurrentValue hides the current value from the patient. HideCurrentValueUnits hides the units of the current value from patient. Program 0-3 to change for amp and pulse width.
